channel.title: CVE Feed for Artifex Software Inc. -- MuPDF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Artifex Software Inc. -- MuPDF

item.title: CVE-2016-8729|2024-09-16T17:24:06.366Z -- artifex%20software%20inc. -- mupdf
item.description: An exploitable memory corruption vulnerability exists in the JBIG2 parser of Artifex MuPDF 1.9. A specially crafted PDF can cause a negative number to be passed to a memset resulting in memory corruption and potential code execution. An attacker can specially craft a PDF and send to the victim to trigger this vulnerability.
